name: Cat Jump - LITE MODE FOR PC
name_original: Cat Jump - LITE MODE FOR PC
description:
Cat Jump is a game made on a game developer platform,  Scratch. This game asks the user to control the cat in order to achieve victory. The points required to win are 200 points.

This game is suitable for all ages.

You can report bugs on the website: https://sites.google.com/view/scratch-catjump
